meanings.definition: Characterized by being awkwardly or inelegantly put together.
meanings.sent1: The old chair was so kludgey that it wobbled whenever someone sat on it.
meanings.sent2: The kludgey table had mismatched legs and a crooked surface.
meanings.sent3: Despite its kludgey appearance, the makeshift bookshelf held all the books perfectly.
meanings.sent4: The kludgey robot moved in a jerky, uncoordinated manner.
meanings.sent5: The kludgey contraption made strange noises as it struggled to function.

meanings.definition: A piece of software or hardware that is poorly designed or implemented.
meanings.sent1: The computer program was a kludgey mess of code that constantly crashed.
meanings.sent2: The technician had to fix the kludgey printer multiple times due to its faulty parts.
meanings.sent3: Trying to use the kludgey software felt like navigating a maze with no map.
meanings.sent4: The kludgey device beeped loudly before shutting down unexpectedly.
meanings.sent5: The team struggled to work with the kludgey system, causing delays in the project.
